name: TexyPix
tag_list: image, text, sharing, long-text, twitter, picture, convert, innovation, frame
description: Converts Ugly Texts To Beautiful Images!
overview: TexyPix is a free service that converts your long texts to beautiful images and post them to your twitter account. So, it will shown directly inside your tweet and the reader’s client like other normal images. There’s no need to click on links to view the complete text or try to shorten your texts to fit on 140 characters and lose the main scope. It will also add your Twitter ID and your avatar to the resulted image to identify the main source over many re-tweets. You can choose your desired frame which your text will be placed on and of course you can design your own frame (i.e containing your photo or your company logo) and our powerful frame rendering engine enables you to easily design very complicated frames.
